name: AIRE (OccamsLazer, TheLittleCrow, India Wishart, Graham Sanders)
name_original: AIRE (OccamsLazer, TheLittleCrow, India Wishart, Graham Sanders)
description: AIRE is a turn based racing game set in the future. The player takes the role of a racing AI. While your opponent is a mere human their car is much more powerful. How will you use your abilities to prove mind over matter?
